details.title: Recap
details.content: India crushed South Africa 5-0 in their first match of the tournament with Simranjeet Singh scoring a brace.

details.title: Momentum
details.content: India will look to carry on the momentum and capitalise on an unimpressive first match for the Belgians against Canada where they narrowly won the match 2-1.

details.title: RSA vs CAN- Result
details.content: South Africa draw 1-1 against Canada in their Pool C clash.

details.title: Head-to-head since 2013
details.content: India have faced Belgium 19 times in past five years and have come out victorious on five occasions while the Belgians have won 13 games. They drew in their last encounter during Champions Trophy at Breda, Netherlands earlier this year.

details.title: What we think?
Coming up
details.content:
Our next challenge at the Odisha Hockey Men’s World Cup Bhubaneswar 2018 will be @BelRedLions, who’ve been bolstered by a win in their last match.

Catch the action LIVE on @StarSportsIndia, @ddsportschannel & @hotstartweets from 7 PM. #INDvBEL #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/NveL9DeU3w

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 2, 2018

details.title: National Anthem
details.content: Both the teams walk out for the national anthem before start of play.

details.title: Match begins
details.content: The match commences with Belgium having the early possession.

details.title: Wishes!
details.content:
Sending my best wishes to the @TheHockeyIndia for their upcoming match against Belgium. May your #hockey sticks rule the field, may your game sweep us off our feet! Go India Go 🇮🇳🏑✌🏻#INDvBEL #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018

— Rajyavardhan Rathore (@Ra_THORe) December 2, 2018

details.title: PC for Belgium
details.content: Belgium get a penalty corner but fail to convert.

details.title: Danger averted
details.content: India defends two penalty corners to keep the Belgium attack away from finding the net.

details.title: The starting XI
details.content:
Here are the 11 men who will step out on the turf to face @BELRedLions for Team India’s second match of the Odisha Men’s Hockey World Cup Bhubaneswar 2018.#IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey #INDvBEL pic.twitter.com/KTYhMP0Tfc

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 2, 2018

details.title: India on attack
details.content: India are attacking the Belgian circle from both sides.

details.title: PC for Belgium
details.content: Belgium win their third penalty corner after a video referral.

details.title: Goal for Belgium
details.content: Belgium draw the first blood against India as they score from the penalty corner.

It's a full house at the Kalinga Stadium, Bhubaneswar, as India would be relying a lot on the their 12th Man, the crowd which would be backing them against the @BELRedLions. #INDvBEL #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/GeW7e7cBHc

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 2, 2018

details.title: India keep up the pressure
details.content: After conceding the first goal, India are back in the attacking mode.

details.title: Chance missed
details.content: India miss out on a goal-scoring oppurtunity after brilliant save by Belgian goalkeeper.

details.title: End of first quarter
details.content: Belgium 1-0 India

details.content:

details.title: Green card
details.content: Akashdeep Singh  gets a green card.
21' Lalit and Dilpreet showcase some fascinating combination play on the edge of the circle as Dilpreet lines up a shot at goal.

27' India's defenders lend a hand in attack as the team moves up the turf using the flanks.

IND 0-1 BEL#INDvBEL #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 2, 2018

details.title: Half-time
details.content: Belgium 1-0 India

29' The tempo is unpredictable on the turf as Belgium try to defend their lead before HT while Team India take any opportunity to quickly move up the turf.

IND 0-1 BEL#INDvBEL #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 2, 2018

details.title: Circle penetration
details.content: Belgium have nine penetration while India have only one.

details.title: Q3 begines
details.content: India are going hard and looking to equalise early in the second half.

details.title: Save!
details.content: Belgian keeper saves another goal attempt by India.

details.title: PC for India
details.content: Chance to equalise as India win a penalty corner

details.title: Penalty stroke
details.content: India win a penalty stroke

details.title: Equaliser
details.content: India equalise from the spot as Harmanpreet nets one with a quick flick.

details.title: India lose referral
details.content: India refer for a PC but the decision stands as the referee doesn't find any conclusive evidence to change the on-field decision.

40' GOAAAAL! @13harmanpreet's faultless shot brings India back on level terms!

IND 1-1 BEL#INDvBEL #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/uLBqhsc2hp

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 2, 2018

details.title: Long shot
details.content: Lalit tries a long aerial shot from the half but is unable to find the net and it goes wide.

details.title: Crowd celebrates
details.content:
....and the crowd goes wild! @13harmanpreet's goal inspired a rousing reaction from the home crowd in the Kalinga Stadium.#INDvBEL #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/UH5mZXPYvx

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 2, 2018

details.title: End of Q3
details.content: Belgium 1-1 India

details.title: Simranjeet scores
details.content: India lead as Simranjeet finishes off brilliantly to take India ahead in the game.

47' GOAL! India takes the lead with Simranjeet's deft finish!

IND 2-1 BEL#INDvBEL #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/QXc2COE4gm

— Hockey India (@TheHockeyIndia) December 2, 2018

details.title: Belgium equalise
details.content: Belgium equalise with a field goal.

details.title: Winner takes all
details.content: Winner of this match will qualify directly for the quarterfinals and has a chance to top the Pool.

details.title: Save
details.content: Sreejesh saves a Belgian attempt from the right.

details.title: Into the last minute
details.content: The match is in it's final minute as scores are level.

details.title: Match tied
details.content: Belgium 2-2 India

details.title: Full-time scores
details.content:
FT. India tide over a challenging match against @BELRedLions at the Odisha Hockey Men's World Cup Bhubaneswar 2018 as an action-packed final quarter kept spectators on the edge of their seats on 2nd December 2018.#INDvBEL #IndiaKaGame #HWC2018 #DilHockey pic.twitter.com/S9nsA7Kpnq
